publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8071 Jamie McGrigor: Murder of Pakistani Minorities Minister Shahbaz Bhatti—That the Parliament notes with sadness the murder of Shahbaz Bhatti, the Pakistani Minorities Minister, allegedly at the hands of Islamist militants and after he had predicted his own assassination; commends Mr Bhatti’s bravery and notes that he was the only Christian minister serving in the Pakistani government and was seen as a champion for all minorities, the non-Muslim Pakistani population, human rights and freedom of speech; condemns violence in all its forms and restates support for democracy, freedom of speech and full human rights including freedom of worship, and sends its condolences to Mr Bhatti’s family, friends and supporters in both Pakistan and the United Kingdom at this time.
